description: Located not far from the historic centre and the picturesque Lama Monachile beach, Jamantè is an elegant restaurant with well-spaced-out tables perfect for a stylish night out. With a focus on fish and seafood, the dishes have their roots in Puglian traditions yet have been successfully reinterpreted with personalised touches by the chef.
